title: Mobile Plan Upgrade
description: An existing customer wants to upgrade their mobile plan to get more data and add an international calling package.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and retrieve their current mobile plan details and usage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's account and details their current plan (e.g., 'Mobile Plus 10GB').

tasks.description: Based on the customer's request for more data, present available upgrade options with their prices and features.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent presents at least two valid upgrade options (e.g., 'Mobile Max 25GB', 'Unlimited Gold').

tasks.description: The customer chooses the 'Unlimited Gold' plan and asks to add the 'Global Talk' package. Confirm the total new monthly cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the new total monthly cost and confirms it with the customer.

tasks.description: Apply the plan changes to the customer's account and confirm when the new plan will become active.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully uses the tool to update the customer's plan and correctly states the activation date (e.g., 'immediately' or 'at the start of the next billing cycle').
